column5: GWPH TLRY I posted on the Tilray board trying to help those poor souls who keep seeing the stock go lower and lower As you can see today GWPH up nearly 2 TLRY down nearly 9 Abandon that dream of 300 because GWPH will get there next year TLRY well that stock will struggle to see even 50 this year so come on over the water is warm

GWPH in a down day I think people realized that GWPH is not a WEED stock its much better than that and now that its back in the channel I am feeling much better and more optimistic Glad I loaded up on them on that dip BO to 200 is back in play
CBD is classified as a drug because of Epidiolex approvalThe FDA hearing was quite favorable for GWPH as the FDA made clear that it wants to ensure that CBD continues clinical research
